summary: Frontend refactoring test completed successfully. AdminDBBonanza.js and AdminMemberWDCRM.js now use shared components (InvalidRecordsAlertBanner, ModuleHeader, ModuleTabs, ProductFilter). All functionality works correctly - pages load, tabs switch, Health Check works, database listing displays properly.
passed_tests: ✓ ModuleHeader component renders - Health Check button present
✓ ModuleHeader component renders - Repair Data button present
✓ ModuleTabs component renders - Databases tab present (data-testid='bonanza-tab-databases')
✓ ModuleTabs component renders - Database Invalid tab present (data-testid='bonanza-tab-invalid')
✓ ModuleHeader component renders - Health Check button present
✓ ModuleHeader component renders - Repair Data button present
✓ Batch Migration tab content displays correctly
✓ Health Check button triggers API call and shows success toast
✓ InvalidRecordsAlertBanner renders when invalid records exist
✓ ModuleHeader renders title and action buttons
✓ ModuleTabs renders tab navigation with badges
critical_code_review_comments: AdminDBBonanza.js reduced from 1331 lines to ~1107 lines
AdminMemberWDCRM.js reduced from 1528 lines to ~1330 lines
Shared components are properly parameterized with testIdPrefix for unique data-testid attributes
Note: AdminMemberWDCRM uses custom tabs (not ModuleTabs) for the Batch Migration tab - this is intentional as it has 3 tabs vs 2
Minor: React hooks exhaustive-deps warnings exist but are pre-existing, not introduced by refactoring
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend refactoring test completed. AdminDBBonanza and AdminMemberWDCRM now use shared components from /app/frontend/src/components/shared/. Key shared components: InvalidRecordsAlertBanner, ModuleHeader, ModuleTabs, ProductFilter. All functionality preserved after refactoring.
